description:
This little editor is ridiculously fast, endlessly extensible and just fun to use.

Alas, it does not have a large community around it, so there are few extensions, language support (auto-completion, definition jumping, etc) is too shallow for proper production use, and it can be quite involved to set tweak to your own liking.
Nice, Fast, Lightweight, blends ideally into gtk, but I got very lost when I got just an editor and nothing else, would be nice to have some kind of welcome screen for first time of help link
